Description.Text: Renovated in 2005, the charming rural hotel with gardens is full of history that embodies the tradition, hospitality, aesthetic genius and harmony of life characteristic of Seville. The hotel is housed within a refurbished Jesuit monastery, with the architecture, decoration and enchantment of former times preserved. Andalusian patios, glazed tiles, mosaics, wooden balconies and whitewashed walls - all alterations to the building have been made respecting the structure and rustic ambience of the typical Andalusian style. This does not prevent the hotel from offering first-class service and amenities and providing and idyllic environment in which to relax and forget the everyday stresses. The hotel comprises 2 floors with a total of 18 rooms. Amongst the facilities count a foyer with a 24-hour reception desk, a caf√©, a bar, a TV room, a restaurant and a dining room. Moreover, there is a conference room to make use of and it is possible to gain access to the Internet. A WLAN access point is available, as are room and laundry services as well as a garage for those arriving by car.
